text: 23.15: FG 25.3Maaŋ muuŋgip, nde mba buaadegi gumgir panin kov, nde kama ndim, mba ntari ga mbui gɨɨtɨvi gari guman panan vhari ndi mbararim, ana Porar kov, nde han zirɨri. Nde ana guigɨp khaŋ ana suaŋri, ‘Nza Por tuituigɨp suaŋgi buni mbari ndɨɨriveŋ kaŋgi zav, anan nzan za mbui.’ Nza ana rargɨ kɨrga. Ana zɨv nden hɨr saŋ muunga, nza za ana shogirim, ana rimgirga.”
